00020    /*
00021    * Constructor for rootPtr AverageStage, with stageId = 0.
00022    */
00023    AverageStage::AverageStage(int blockFactor)
00024     : sum_(0.0),
00025       sumSq_(0.0),
00026       blockSum_(0.0),
00027       nSample_(0),
00028       nBlockSample_(0),
00029       stageInterval_(1),
00030       childPtr_(0),
00031       rootPtr_(0),
00032       stageId_(0),
00033       blockFactor_(blockFactor)
00034    {
00035       rootPtr_ = this;
00036    }
00037    
00038    /*
00039    * Constructor for dynamically generated objects with stageId > 0.
00040    */
00041    AverageStage::AverageStage(long stageInterval, int stageId, AverageStage* rootPtr, int blockFactor)
00042     : sum_(0.0),
00043       sumSq_(0.0),
00044       blockSum_(0.0),
00045       nSample_(0),
00046       nBlockSample_(0),
00047       stageInterval_(stageInterval),
00048       childPtr_(0),
00049       rootPtr_(rootPtr),
00050       stageId_(stageId),
00051       blockFactor_(blockFactor)
00052    {}
00053    
00054    void AverageStage::registerDescendant(AverageStage* descendantPtr)
00055    {}
00056 
00057    /*
00058    * Destructor.
00059    */
00060    AverageStage::~AverageStage()
00061    { 
00062       if (childPtr_) {
00063          delete childPtr_; 
00064       }
00065    }
00066    
00067    /*
00068    * Reset all accumulators and counters to zero.
00069    */
00070    void AverageStage::clear() 
00071    {
00072       sum_          = 0.0;
00073       sumSq_        = 0.0;
00074       blockSum_     = 0.0;
00075       nSample_      = 0;
00076       nBlockSample_ = 0;
00077       if (childPtr_) {
00078          delete childPtr_; 
00079       }
00080    }
00081    
00082    /*
00083    * Add a sampled value to the ensemble.
00084    */
00085    void AverageStage::sample(double value) 
00086    {
00087    
00088       // Increment global accumulators
00089       sum_    += value;
00090       sumSq_  += (value*value);
00091       ++nSample_;
00092 
00093       // Increment block accumulators
00094       blockSum_   += value;
00095       ++nBlockSample_;
00096    
00097       if (nBlockSample_ == blockFactor_) {
00098 
00099          if (!childPtr_) {
00100             long nextStageInterval = stageInterval_*blockFactor_;
00101             int  nextStageId       = stageId_ + 1;
00102             childPtr_ = new AverageStage(nextStageInterval, nextStageId, rootPtr_, blockFactor_);
00103             rootPtr_->registerDescendant(childPtr_);
00104          }
00105 
00106          // Add block average to child ensemble
00107          childPtr_->sample( blockSum_ / double(blockFactor_) );
00108 
00109          // Reset block accumulators
00110          blockSum_     = 0.0;
00111          nBlockSample_ = 0;
00112 
00113       }
00114    
00115    }
00116 
00117    /*
00118    * Return the average of all sampled values.
00119    */
00120    double AverageStage::average() const
00121    {  return sum_/double(nSample_); }
00122    
00123    /*
00124    * Return the variance of all sampled values
00125    */
00126    double AverageStage::variance() const
00127    {
00128       double rSample_ = double(nSample_);
00129       double ave   = sum_/rSample_;
00130       double aveSq = sumSq_/rSample_;
00131       return aveSq - ave*ave;
00132    }
00133    
00134    /*
00135    * Return the standard deviation of all sampled values
00136    */
00137    double AverageStage::stdDeviation() const
00138    {  return sqrt(variance()); }
00139       
00140    /*
00141    * Return the number of sampled values
00142    */
00143    long AverageStage::nSample() const
00144    {  return nSample_; }
00145       
00146    /*
00147    * Return the number of measured values per sample at this stage.
00148    */
00149    long AverageStage::stageInterval() const
00150    {  return stageInterval_; }
00151       
00152    /*
00153    * Estimated statistical error of the average().
00154    */
00155    double AverageStage::error() const
00156    {  return sqrt(variance()/double(nSample_)); }
00157 
00158 }
